SEARCH
Module com.aerospace.gui3d
Package com.aerospace.gui3d

Class Model3D

java.lang.Object
com.aerospace.gui3d.Model3D
public class Model3D extends Object
A class representing a 3D model viewer with camera controls and model manipulation capabilities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Model3D()
    Constructs a Model3D object, initializing the root group, camera, scene, and loading the 3D model.
